languages.text: {n}Соломон ловит ваш взгляд и коротко кивает на самого напуганного из охранников Саргоны, а затем проводит большим пальцем по запястью. "Этого в расход".{/n}
{n}Solomorne catches your eye, then nods subtly toward the most frightened-looking of Sargona's guards and drags a finger across his palm, signalling: "That one dies first."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон ловит ваш взгляд и коротко кивает на самого напуганного из охранников Саргоны, а затем проводит большим пальцем по запястью. "Этого в расход".{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne llama tu atención y señala sutilmente con la cabeza al guardia de Sargona que más miedo muestra en el rostro. Se pasa un dedo por la palma de la mano en un gesto que significa: «Ese muere primero».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne catches your eye, then nods subtly toward the most frightened-looking of Sargona's guards and drags a finger across his palm, signalling: "That one dies first."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne llama tu atención y señala sutilmente con la cabeza al guardia de Sargona que más miedo muestra en el rostro. Se pasa un dedo por la palma de la mano en un gesto que significa: «Ese muere primero».{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的目光落在了索罗蒙身上。他看着萨戈纳身边两股战战的守卫，微不可见地点了点头，手指划过手掌，示意道——“先杀那个人。”{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne catches your eye, then nods subtly toward the most frightened-looking of Sargona's guards and drags a finger across his palm, signalling: "That one dies first."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的目光落在了索罗蒙身上。他看着萨戈纳身边两股战战的守卫，微不可见地点了点头，手指划过手掌，示意道——“先杀那个人。”{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne attire votre attention, puis il désigne d'un signe de tête imperceptible le garde de Sargona qui semble le plus effrayé et passe un doigt en travers de sa paume en guise de signal : « Celui-ci sera le premier à mourir. »{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne catches your eye, then nods subtly toward the most frightened-looking of Sargona's guards and drags a finger across his palm, signalling: "That one dies first."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne attire votre attention, puis il désigne d'un signe de tête imperceptible le garde de Sargona qui semble le plus effrayé et passe un doigt en travers de sa paume en guise de signal : « Celui-ci sera le premier à mourir. »{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはあなたの視線を捕らえ、そして最も恐ろしい見た目のサルゴナの護衛に向かってわずかにうなずき、拳を握りしめ、合図する。「まず、あいつが死ぬ」{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne catches your eye, then nods subtly toward the most frightened-looking of Sargona's guards and drags a finger across his palm, signalling: "That one dies first."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはあなたの視線を捕らえ、そして最も恐ろしい見た目のサルゴナの護衛に向かってわずかにうなずき、拳を握りしめ、合図する。「まず、あいつが死ぬ」{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne gözüne ilişiyor. Sargona'nın muhafızlarından en korkmuş görüneni işaret edip bir parmağını avcunun içinde sürüyor: "İlk şu ölecek."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne catches your eye, then nods subtly toward the most frightened-looking of Sargona's guards and drags a finger across his palm, signalling: "That one dies first."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne gözüne ilişiyor. Sargona'nın muhafızlarından en korkmuş görüneni işaret edip bir parmağını avcunun içinde sürüyor: "İlk şu ölecek."{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne sucht deinen Blick und nickt unmerklich in die Richtung eines besonders bedrohlich wirkenden Piraten. Dann streicht er mit einem Finger über seine Handfläche, um dir zu signalisieren: "Der hier stirbt zuerst."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne catches your eye, then nods subtly toward the most frightened-looking of Sargona's guards and drags a finger across his palm, signalling: "That one dies first."{/n}
